metadata.title: CVE-2013-6167 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Mozilla Firefox through 27 sends HTTP Cookie headers without firstvalidating that they have the required character-set restrictions, whichallows remote attackers to conduct the equivalent of a persistent LogoutCSRF attack via a crafted parameter that forces a web application to set amalformed cookie within an HTTP response.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
